description.username: The user's shorthand name. Limited to 25 characters, and may only contain letters and underscores.
description.username_help: Limited to 25 characters, and may only contain letters and underscores.
description.group_mask: Determines the group's position in its hierarchy. The lower the mask, the higher the group status.
description.media_alt: A text alternative to the image for screen readers or when the image does not load.
description.media_description: For internal purposes, to help with tracking in searches.
description.media_caption: May be displayed below the image for commentary/description purposes.

user_delete.t: Do you really want to delete user {name}?|Do you really want to delete those {number} users?

group_delete.t: Do you really want to delete group {name}?

blog_post_delete.t: Do you really want to delete blog post "{name}"?|Do you really want to delete those {number} blog posts?

user_profile_updated.t: We use your e-mail address to identify you, so we are going to log you out for safety reasons. Please log back in using your new e-mail address.

error.t: Something went wrong! Please try again.

token_expired.t: Please log in again to continue.

unauthorized.t: You are not authorized to view this page.

error.form: Errors were found on this form.
error.add_category: Creation of category "{cat}" failed. Please try again.

message.user_delete_ok: User {name} was deleted.|The users were deleted.
message.blog_post_delete_ok: The blog post was deleted.|The {number} blog posts were deleted.

members.member_search: Type user full name here, i.e "Jane Doe"
members.user_add_tag: The following users will be added:
members.user_remove_tag: The following users will be removed:
members.user_none: There are no members in this group.
members.current_members: The following users are members of this group:

users.warning1: Setting individual permissions for this user will override permissions set on groups of which the user is a member.
users.warning2:
We recommend setting permissions on groups instead, 
            and use individual user permissions to handle exceptions.

groups.info1: Permissions for all members of the group are defined here.
groups.info2:
Individual permissions can also be set at the user level,
            in which case user permissions will override permissions set here.

user.notifications: Choose the events for which you would like to receive live notifications:

settings.allow_robots: Allow search engine bots to crawl pages
settings.entity_social_help: Links to user/organization profiles can be added below. Google recognizes the following platforms: Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, Myspace, Pinterest, SoundCloud and Tumblr.
settings.sitemap_help: Links to website pages can be added below. They will be displayed in the sitemap along with a link to the homepage.
settings.title: Website settings

blog.add_tag_pholder: Type enter to add tag, click to remove
blog.author: Author
blog.click_featured: Click on an image to make it the featured image for this post.
blog.excerpt_label: This user-defined summary of the post can be displayed on the front page.

system_log.notifications: No new notifications|1 new notification|{number} new notifications

media.formats_help: Formats marked with have already been created and are ready to be served. Click on a format to create an image file with the associated dimensions.

tables.btn_apply_title: Apply action to all selected users

pwd-strength.too_short: The password must meet the minimum length condition.
pwd-strength.too_long: The password must fewer the maximum length condition.
pwd-strength.one_lowercase: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
pwd-strength.one_uppercase: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
pwd-strength.one_number: The password must contain at least one number.
pwd-strength.special_char: The password must contain at least one special character.
pwd-strength.has_repeats: The password may not contain sequences of three or more repeated characters.

avatar-uploader.click_default: Click on an avatar to make it your profile picture. Avatar changes will be saved automatically.
avatar-uploader.image_uploaded: The avatar has been processed, you can return to the avatar tab.

dropzone.choose_file: Drag and drop your file here (or click to browse)
dropzone.file_too_big: File is too big ({{filesize}} MB, maximum allowed: {{maxFilesize}} MB).
dropzone.file_too_big_laravel: File is too big (:filesize MB, maximum allowed: :maxFilesize MB).
dropzone.invalid_type: This file type is not allowed.
dropzone.max_files_exceeded: The maximum number of files was reached.
